thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Clara
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Clara

author: Clara
title: Clara
text: Very poor service, Rugby top ordered in shop on 16.03.17, was assured it would be delivered in store on the Saturday 18th by 1pm. Went to store, no top and could not get a refund until the top came in. Called the shop numerous times on Sunday, rang out. Got a text from someone in the store on Tuesday 21st to say the top was in, call in when it suits for my refund. Top was a gift for my brother who went back to the states on the Sunday. Not impressed at all and will never ever shop in Lifestyle again
